Game.Name: Game no Kandume Otokuyou (Japan) (Sega Channel)
Game.plot: Game no Kanzume Otokuyō (Can of Games Economy Version) is a collection of 12 Meganet titles, released exclusively on the SEGA Channel service in Japan. Games included:16tAwogueFatal LabyrinthFlickyHyper MarblesIkasuze! Koi no Doki Doki Penguin Land MDMedal CityPaddle FighterPutter GolfPyramid MagicRobot BattlerTeddy Boy Blues
Game.Developer: SEGA Enterprises Ltd.The Games: Summer Challenge
